questions.question: What is the primary color of the bottle's label, prominently displaying the product name?
What is the overall shape of the container holding the supplement tablets?
What material is the primary container composed of, judging by its appearance?
What is the dominant color scheme of the brand logo featured on the label?
What is explicitly stated as the daily dosage recommendation for this product?
What is the specific type of dietary supplement indicated on the front label?
What key descriptive term is displayed directly below the product's name?
What is the number of tablets stated to be within the container shown?
What is the overall texture of the plastic bottle, based on visual observation?
What is the style of the text on the primary label, appearing mostly in sans-serif font?
What is indicated by the text concerning the supplement's intended effect on muscle function?
What is one of the ingredients listed as contributing to prostate health?
What form of seal is visually apparent around the bottle's cap indicating its closure?
What is depicted on the label, suggesting a brand guarantee of quality?
What is the prominent visual element on the label, besides the name, that suggests its target demographic?
